item.title: re:Wind 2022 ðŸ“œ
item.description:
re:Wind 2022 - A stepping stone, not a milestone.

Summary

  • Every year in December, I create a list of my annual achievements vs. what I could have done better, self-retrospective. This helps me to establish my achievable goals and prevent myself from frustration.

  • 2021 was an average year with the pandemic & work from home. I focused on most of the learning and established a constant routine between work, learning & community contribution.

item.description:
Recap of AWS re:Invent 2022 - App Integration, Serverless & DevSecOps Highlights

Overview

  • AWS re:Invent 2022 is in the bag! The 11th iteration of the annual cloud conference saw more than 50,000 partners and customers descend on Las Vegas in person, accompanied by more than 300,000 remote attendees.

     The world is asynchronous. The world is event-driven. â€” Dr. Werner Vogels, CTO, Amazon.com

  • It required a world stage to propagate asynchrony and event-driven architecture in our modern era of cloud computing. And thatâ€™s precisely what Dr. Werner Vogels delivered in his keynote at re:Invent 2022.

item.title: Recap of AWS re:Invent 2022 - Data & Analytics Highlights ðŸ“œ
item.description:
Recap of AWS re:Invent 2022 - Data & Analytics Highlights

Overview

  • AWS re:Invent 2022 is in the bag! The 11th iteration of the annual cloud conference saw more than 50,000 partners and customers descend on Las Vegas in person, accompanied by more than 300,000 remote attendees.
  • The event featured excellent keynote speakers, product announcements, training and certification opportunities, hands-on technical sessions, and more. I was thrilled to witness all of the fun, fully embracing AWS CEO Adam Selipsky’s message that now is the perfect time to “lean in harder” to help clients accelerate their journey to the cloud.
  • In this event, AWS made a couple of announcements focusing on AI/ML, Data, Analytics, Storage, App Integration, Infrastructure & Security. We will see the announcements from Data & Analytics that excite me in this blog post.

Announcements from Database section
